hiveArticle.title: #ColorChallenge - Friday Blue - Blue Sky and A Lake
hiveArticle.body:
### <center>Namaste, Have a great day everyone. My entry for today's #colorchallenge by @kalemandra is a Landscape in Udaipur. This image was taken on my Visit to Udaipur last month.</center>

<hr>
